subject: Football
College Athletics
Assaults
lead_paragraph: Two employees of the bar where Louisiana State quarterback Jordan Jefferson and three teammates are accused of injuring four people in a parking lot brawl said Thursday that one of the victims “threw the first punch” shortly after he had been escorted outside by staff.
